title: Strengthening Stake Pools in Africa
description: Stakepools in Africa are subject to outages and infrastructure issues on top of the general risks faced by SPOs
solution: Design a support system specifically for the unique challenges of running a stakepool in Africa and create a learning hub for African SPOs
experience: SPO with the first Cardano relay node based in Ghana. Partnership with WADA for a membership and peer-to-peering learning platform for SPOs
